source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_000<tab>Only those with express permission from the manager of the Celestium may enter. Please, move along─you are making the place look untidy.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_000<tab>Вход разрешен только тем, у кого есть специальное разрешение управляющего «Небесами». Пожалуйста, отойдите, из-за вас обстановка выглядит неухоженной.

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_001<tab>The Masked Carnivale─the series of arena events specifically for the demonstration of blue magic─is, unsurprisingly, only open to practitioners of said discipline. But you knew that already, did you not?
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_001<tab>Карнавал масок — серия мероприятий на арене, специально предназначенных для демонстрации синей магии. Как бы это не прозвучало удивительно, вход разрешён лишь для практиков данной дисциплины. Но вы уже знали об этом, не так ли?

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_010<tab>The Masked Carnivale is one of the many forms of entertainment on offer here at the Celestium, and was created by none other than the manager herself, Miss Royse.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_010<tab>Карнавал масок — одна из многочисленных форм развлечений, предлагаемых в «Небесах», и была создана никем иным, как самой управляющей — мисс Ройз.

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_011<tab>Building on our established reputation for providing shows in which man confronts beast, this particular event is specially designed for blue mages, who are fairly recent arrivals in Eorzea.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_011<tab>Опираясь на нашу репутацию организаторов различных шоу, в которых человек противостоит зверю, это мероприятие специально разработано для синих магов, которые совсем недавно пришли в Эорзию.

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_012<tab>There is but one rule: incapacitate or be incapacitated. Killing is strongly discouraged here, you see. Our clientele is far too sophisticated to revel in the barbaric bloodsports one might find in less reputable establishments.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_012<tab>Есть только одно правило: вывести из строя противника или самому быть выведенным из строя. Убийства здесь категорически не приветствуются. Наша клиентура слишком искушена, чтобы наслаждаться варварскими кровавыми расправами, которые можно встретить в менее солидных заведениях.

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_013<tab>Having said that, the creatures that enter the pit have no understanding of such subtleties and will not hesitate to claw, bite, gore, and otherwise maim any contestant foolish enough to overestimate their own abilities.
target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_013<tab>Однако существа, которых мы отлавливаем для арены, не понимают таких тонкостей и без колебаний будут царапать, кусать и иными способами калечить любого участника, достаточно глупого, чтобы переоценить свои способности.

source: TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_014<tab>I must also point out that only blue mages are eligible to enter the Masked Carnivale. That is what the audience comes to see, and we are not in the business of disappointing paying customers.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_015<tab>Provided you follow our rules─and survive, of course─you will be generously rewarded. In fact, an especially emphatic performance may prompt the management to throw in a little something extra...
TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_016<tab>The Masked Carnivale is comprised of solo duties for blue mages.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_017<tab>Each match contains between one and three acts. Defeating all of the opponents in one act will allow you to proceed to the next. Finish all acts to complete the performance.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_018<tab>A special reward of gil, Allied Seals, and Allagan tomestones will be provided upon completing a performance for the first time.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_019<tab>You may check which enemies will appear and their weaknesses before each performance.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_020<tab>Choosing spells that exploit the opponent's weaknesses is the key to victory.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_030<tab>Our clientele soon grow tired of seeing the same tricks over and over, so we have introduced weekly targets to encourage participants to vary their approaches.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_031<tab>While it is by no means compulsory, the management will be very grateful should you be successful in achieving any of these goals during your performance. Naturally, such appreciation is often expressed through the proffering of more bountiful rewards.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_032<tab>Weekly targets are available for certain performances, indicated with an icon.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_033<tab>By fulfilling predetermined conditions such as “Took no damage” or “Cast only fire- or unaspected spells” you may be eligible for additional bonuses.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_034<tab>Be sure to check these conditions before beginning a performance, and choose your spells accordingly.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZENTRANCE_00558_BLUESKYGUIDE_000_035<tab>There are three levels of difficulty for weekly targets: novice, moderate, and advanced. Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
